values: <font face="Times New Roman" size="4">Ah why is it when one guy comes along theres about 3 behind him aswell swear to god they are like feckin buses! So went out last night with the girls and couple of guys from work was such a laugh, we were totally wrecked as per usual haha. Met my Dads new girlfriend yesterday aswell, shes really nice actually I was quite worried that i wasnt gonna like her but its all goooood, plus shes irish thats always a bonus haha. So I never got my lip pierced I got my sternum instead and some part of my ear cant remember what its called lol. Anyways gonna head just now feel like going for a walk. Love n stuff xxx</font>

i forgot to mention that my bottom anti tragus piercing migrated so much it came out. GUTTED!! oh well getting my lip done when I get paid anyways. Im also thinking of getting my tongue done again but horizontally.
Its race night tomorrow...drunken gambling with teachers, oh the fun we broughtoners have. 

I feel like....toast and coffee!
My hair is pissing me off. I hate the new colour its not dark enough. Everytime I wash it its getting closer and closer to my natural colour, raaaaaging.

oh well night night
x

Im sooooooo fucking bored its ridiculous. On the plus side its oanas fancy dress party next week WOOP!! Im going as a police woman.  Yeuppp so I've left school now, I was pretty much getting kicked out anyways for never being there. Im there more now than I was when I was meant to be haha. Ach wellll.  Cant believe how bored I am and dont even have anything to write either. Erm.... the whole love life has went down the pan, but nothing new there though lol.

Do you want to go to the seaside? YES YES YES!!!! but I have to wait half an hour :( which is poo because 

I want to go now!

 like as in.....right this very second! The hyperness is settling in!! w00p! Need to go get ready 

yeaaaah!

Love.x

sooooooooooooooo bored its unbelievable. Im in Elsrickle just now and there is absolutly nothing to do.literlly, outside is fields and sheep. I went to a restaurant earlier for my uncle johns bday and all the american relatives were there. They were soooo loud and kept calling me stuff and I was embarassed as hell!

So, I forgot to update again last night haha. Not that I really done much yesterday anyways. Spent most of the day mucking about editing myspace and then Dionne came over to watch 'Thirteen', well the rest of it coz she didnt see it all on wednesday night. Then we went for a smoke and "a boy" texted me. Not spoke to that boy for a while so we're gonna catch up on sunday, oana isnt happy about it though she keeps telling me to remind myself of what happened last time I "got involved" with him haha. But ooooh well. Might update again later on tonight as Im going to Elsrickle so Im gonna have nothing to do hmmmm fun! or not!
love.x

Ok so not such a good morning but oh well. Im sooo tired I was up talking to "a boy" till about half two last night on msn. Had quite a laugh like haha. So cant be bothered reflecting over yesterdays events because I've had tears already this morning about it, especially because of my stupid dream. Hmmm... what can I do today, I need to take a dvd back to the shop and HAVE to get some revision done otherwise the exams will be failed miserably and I so dont want that to happen considering I've already dropped a class so will be down a grade already. Oh well what can be done...

Tonight was like major league boring! Went uptown with Dionne, Robert n Kez and me and dionne had some grass n stuff then we all went to the train station. We could have been at a gig at the bongo club but Dionne didnt want to go *cries*. Oh well...  Weeeee its Oanas birthday thingy tomorrow, drinking, ice skating, chinese and dvds, should be a laugh like cant wait! theres like 10 of us staying at her house though, dunno where the frig we're gonna sleep lol. Oh having major problems about presents, I dont know what to get anybody and Im running out of time really badly lol. *coz my lifes a mess* Ok bored now byeee xxx ---------------------------- just have to say listen to Robbie Williams singing in french, sooooo good <3 xx

Someone told me something that I cant believe. Lets call this person x for now. X told me she was raped when she was 9. Nine fucking years old, who the hell would do something so sick to a fucking 9 year old. Grrrr! People like that should not be allowed to live in my opinion, theyr sick and twisted and deserve to die.

03 September 
 
 
 
spanish eyes 
 
I know for sure his heart is here with me
Though I wish him back, I know he cannot see
My hands trembling, I know he hears me sing

[Chorus:]

I light this candle and watch it throw
Tears on my pillow
And if there is a Christ, he'll come tonight
To pray for Spanish eyes
And if I have nothing left to show
Tears on my pillow
What kind of life is this if God exists
Then help me pray for Spanish eyes

He had to fight like all the rest
In the barrio all the streets are paved with fear
I don't understand; at least he was a man

[chorus]

[Intermediate:]

How many lives will they have to take?
How much heartache?
How many suns will they have to burn?
Spanish eyes
When will they ever learn?

You were not the Maravilla in our minds
We were proud to fight but we cannot win this blind
Stand your guns against the wall
Who's next in line to fall

[chorus]

[Spoken:]

Tus lagrimas de tristeza
No me dejan olvidarte
Your tears of sadness
Will not let me forget you

[intermediate]

And I know that you're a sucker for anything acoustic.
But when I say let's keep in touch,
I hope you know I mean I wish that you'd grow up.
This is the first song for your mixtape.
It's short just like your temper,

but somewhat golden like the
 
afternoons we used to spend
 
before you got to cool...
 

(yeah, but I wish you
 
were my
 
 shadow.)

Passed out on the overpass 
Sunday best and broken glass 
Broken down from the bikes and bars 
Suspended like spirits over speeding cars 
You and me were kings over the parkway tonight 
And tonight will go on forever while we 
walk around this town like we own the streets 
and stay awake through summer like we own the heat 
Singing "everybody wake up (wake up) it's time to get down" 
(everybody, everybody wake up its time to get down) 
And when I pass the bottle back to Pete 
on the overpass tonight, I bet we laugh 

I'm gonna stay eighteen forever (cut me open) 
So we can stay like this forever (sun poisoned) 
And we'll never miss a party (this offer...)
cause we keep them going constantly (...stands forever)
And we'll never have to listen (new haircut) 
to anyone about anything (new bracelet) 
cause it's all been done and it's all been said (eyeliner) 
we're the coolest kids and we take what we can get

The hell out of this town 
Find some conversation 
The low fuel lights been on for days 
It doesn't mean anything 
I've got another 500, 'nother 500 miles 
before we shut this engine down, 
we shut it down 

I'm gonna stay eighteen forever (cut me open) 
So we can stay like this forever (sun poisoned) 
And we'll never miss a party (this offer...)
cause we keep them going constantly (...stands forever)
And we'll never have to listen (new haircut) 
to anyone about anything (new bracelet) 
cause it's all been done and it's all been said (eyeliner) 
we're the coolest kids and we take what we can get (wait forever) 

(you're just jealous cause I'm young and in love) 
Eighteen forever (first kisses)
(your stomach's filled up but you're starved for conversation) 
So we can stay like this forever (new stitches)
(you're spending all your nights growing old in your bed) 
And we'll never miss a party (collar weekend)
(and your tearin up your photos cause you wanna forget... it's over) 
cause we keep them going constantly (appearance ticket)
(you're just jealous cause I'm young and in love) 
And we'll never have to listen (November to...)
(your stomach's filled up but you're starved for conversation) 
to anyone about anything cause it's all been done (...remember)
(you're spending all your nights growing old in your bed) 
and it's all been said (nightswimmers)
(and your tearin up your photos cause you wanna forget... it's over) 
we're the coolest kids and we take what we can get 

Just jealous cause we're young and in love 
You're just jealous cause we're young and in love 
You're just jealous cause we're young and in love 
You're just jealous cause we're young and in love 
You're just jealous cause we're young and in love 
You're just jealous...

howdy doody! So, my internet was cut off for about a week, I nearly died without it lol. Thats quite sad come to think of it, ach well. I still have lines to learn for drama aswell *2 months till the play!!* shmooop, 2 months till Mcfly! W00P W00P! and just over a week till andrew gets back yey! But then Im going on holiday in 3 weeks bleugh. Oh well rant over going to go and start on some homework byesee bye xxxx

heylooo, so today I was in Elsrickle *somewhere in the middle of nowhere* playing golf in the middle of a field on a farm it was actually quite fun considering I cant play golf but I did manage to hit the bal everytime *w00t! Go me!* So what else did I do....me and my stepmum were in the garden next to the field doing handstands for some random reason which was funny, especially when my 5 year old step-sis was trying to do them and kept going flying. Then Dad and I went to maccy d's for dinner and dropped me at home. Ha Oana is totally screwed, she went to the pictures with nizzi tonight and bumped into like everyone! including his ex-girlfriend but I think shes ok with it lol. So now Im just sitting waiting on ten past eleven so I can watch the rest of a film about margot fonteyne. Oh how much of an exciting life I lead...or not.  Awwww andrew is in the phillipenes he sucks! He should be here lol. Ok im being uber sad now so bye xxxx

Heyloo again. So, im bored again and thought Id give you an interesting *cough cough* account of my day. Well...so this morning I got up, had a shower which was freezing cold for some reason even though I had it on the hottest level, got dressed in nothing interesting lol and dried and straightened my hair. This afternoon I made some cheesy pasta for my brothers lunch, watched Buffy season 2 and checked my email, I had like 126 new emails most of which I deleted without reading as I usually do lol. And hm....this evening so far I have gave myself  a french manicure, watched season 3 of Buffy and now on here and still watching Buffy lol. Oh i have such a preductive life, o....r not lol. Better go because now I have to start babysitting bye xxxx

Almost 3 months!! Thats how long I've not seen andrew for :( *cries* only have to wait another 3 weeks to see him though *w00t* So....I got exam results and was happy with them all especially maths as I thought I was doomed to fail it. Oana banana is back from Romania at long last and shes so tanned that we're nick named her bobby *personal joke sorry :P* hm...well Im bored so Im going to go and shleep (:  only 2 months till McFly though!! had to be said ha! Bye xxxx
       -Lauz

Hey, happy new year. I thought I'd post an entry as I've not done so since before christmas. So here I am, even though I dont have anything to write about. So, I found out what part I got in the play, I got one of the main parts and Im really happy about it:)  I have a new fave tv show called 'Desperate Housewives', its really funny. OMG! I cant wait until October because I'm going to see McFly with Bambi and Nez. Mimi, jo and magz are going but not with us, because we're going as part of my birthday, (even though my birthday is in march lol). Oh well I tihnk Im just going to go just now and I'll probably post again tomorrow. Thats if I'm well enough because Im really not feeling well jsut now.

       -Brightest Blessings

Im going to the mission on Friday for 5 HOURS!! its gonna be so much fun, everyone is dressin up, mimi is going as a goth, joanne as a fairy, craig as santa and me as a cheerleader lol. Oh well gonna go

Sayin I love you is not the words I want to hear from you Its not that I want you not to say but if you only knew how easy it would be to show me how you feel more than words is all you have to do to make it real then you wouldnt have to say that you loved me coz Id already know What would you do if my heart was torn in two more than words to show you feel that your love for me is real what would you say if I took those words away then you couldnt make things new just by sayin I love you more than words more than words now that Ive tried to talk to you and make you understand all you have to do is close your eyes and just reach out your hand and touch me hold me close dont every let me go more than words is all i ever needed you to show then you wouldnt have to say that you loved me coz Id already know...

Well... thats it my last ever day working in that minging place! I no longer have to go back or work there. It leaves me time to carry on with drama and dance, two things that I love. Anyways moving on, Christmas is coming in seven days and yule in five! How good is that?!?! More things that I love, wow! I feel so happy, I dont even know why Im in such a cheerful mood. Oh well best be going and leave things on a happy note! Brightest Blessings

Lauz xxx
